channel.title: FINALLY! Skill(S)Cape V1 ~~RELEASED~~ Use it yourself now :)
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i752.photobucket.com/albums/xx164/vassilistein/Heythere.jpg[/img] [size=24pt]FINALLY! Skill(S)Cape is released to use it yourself and edit! :)[/size] Features: [ul][li]KBD[/li] [li]GODWARD DUNGEON WITH[/li] [li]ZAMMY[/li] [li]SARADOMIN[/li] [li]BANODS[/li] [li]-[/li] [li]MEMBERS AREA[/li] [li]SHOPS[/li] [li]MAGE BANK[/li] [li]PK[/li] [li]PKbox[/li] [li]Funpk[/li] [li]JAD[/li] [li]Donator Items[/li] [li]ALL STAFF[/li] [li]Highscores[/li] [li]Vote system[/li] [li]Login messages[/li] [li]Logs for every catergory you want to check[/li] [li]Commands like ::getpass ::compateips[/li][/ul] COMMANDS: [ul][li]ROFL! I wont type more than 150 Commands here! Just type ::commands :D[/li][/ul] Now, everyone likes them: The pictures: TRAIN: (Thanks to Mod Demolish) [IMG]http://i752.photobucket.com/albums/xx164/vassilistein/train.jpg[/img] SKILLS: (Thanks to Mod Demolish) [IMG]http://i752.photobucket.com/albums/xx164/vassilistein/Skills.jpg[/img] SHOPS: [IMG]http://i752.photobucket.com/albums/xx164/vassilistein/shops.jpg[/img] PKbox: [IMG]http://i752.photobucket.com/albums/xx164/vassilistein/Pkbox.jpg[/img] JAD: (Will be better soon) [IMG]http://i752.photobucket.com/albums/xx164/vassilistein/Jad.jpg[/img] Home: (Coding this took more than 100 Hours wtf? :D) [IMG]http://i752.photobucket.com/albums/xx164/vassilistein/Home.jpg[/img] Barrows: [IMG]http://i752.photobucket.com/albums/xx164/vassilistein/barrows.jpg[/img] LINKS: Source and Client: You'll get the DemolishScape Client by Mod Demolish because many credits go to Mod Demolish. If you load client at the IP Line will appear the IP of his server automaticaly. You can delete this and replace it with your IP. Its just because of he helped much. [URL=http://up.ht/h9yFiW]SkillScape Source V1.rar - 2.1 Mb[/URL](SOURCE) NOTE: Edited. Deleted chars. :D [URL=http://up.ht/hZdZHC]SkillScape Client V1.rar - 17.3 Mb[/URL] (CLIENT [DEMOLISH]) Credits:
RuneScape 5% Mod Demolish 20% Vazzily (me) 74% You (lol^^) 1%
Frequently asked Questions: Empty Greetings, Vazzily NOTES: 23.2.2011, 8:42 PM GMT +1. Edited Source. Repasted new link. UPDATES: 23.2.2011, 8:42 PM GMT +1. Edited Source. Repasted new link. Anything else: -
